In boston? Let's hang out this weekend at the "Head of the Charles"

So check this out - the Head of the Charles Regatta is on this weekend.Â Im inviting pretty much everyone I know in Boston - and anyone I have yet to know to hang out at the best spot to see the regatta:

The weeks footbridge.

This is all according to my friend who organizes the event:

There is an excellent view of the Powerhouse Stretch and it's right in the middle of the action - free concert (Toots and the Maytals at 3:30pm on Sat), Reunion Village (social destination - beer & wine) and Weld Exhibition (corporate display).

Time and Place Date: Saturday, October 20, 2007 Time: 1:00pm - 4:30pm Location: Weeks Footbridge Street: 953 Memorial Dr City/Town: Cambridge, MA Find your way there on Google Maps Stop by and check it out! We'll probably find somewhere to sit and have a few beers right around there. 617-818-5576 for details. You can also respond to this facebook invite
